meanings.definition: To convert grapes into wine through fermentation.
meanings.sent1: The winemaker vinified the grapes to make a delicious wine.
meanings.sent2: The vineyard vinified the grapes to create their signature red blend.
meanings.sent3: The grapes were vinified into wine, turning them from fruit to drink.
meanings.sent4: She vinified the grapes with care, like a magician turning grapes into liquid gold.
meanings.sent5: The process of vinifying grapes is essential in winemaking.

meanings.sent1: The fresh harvest was vinified into a crisp white wine.
meanings.sent2: The winery vinified the grapes to produce a rich, full-bodied red.
meanings.sent3: The grapes were vinified into wine, transforming them into a delightful drink.
meanings.sent4: He vinified the grapes, creating a masterpiece in a bottle.
meanings.sent5: The art of vinifying grapes requires skill and patience.
